Spouse

$53.70 $57.90

Add to cart $53.70

  * Looking for a special anniversary gifts for her/him? You just found it! Say "I Love You" with this super unique antique decor style Sundial & Compass, having personalized quote engraved on it, expressing your big love on this special day, with the context of this unique item use (Time and Direction)...
  * Your Love one is so special to you, so in that happy anniversary day, he/she deserve something special. Surprise him/her this year, with that unforgettable life time lasting unique gift. Suitable for any year celebration.
  * Made of super high quality polished Brass, coming in a beautiful Mango wood case, with a transparent glass on top. Engraved quote on the item : "My Dear, Happy Anniversary! Will always be beside you at any time & any direction… Love You Forever!", In the context of this unique item use.
  * Great romantic gifts ideas for husband or wife , long distance relationships gifts, Can be used outdoors/hiking, can be placed as decoration in the living room, office or any preferred location.
  * So Just Grab Yours Now & Have an Happy Anniversary Day! The OakiWay family would be love and proud to be part of your great celebration day! Make this anniversary day an unforgettable one, for your love one and for yourself!
